name: Raz Adventure - NES Homebrew
description:
A very  small game I made in a few month spring/summer of 2021 for a friend giving away a NES-game as a birthday gift.

The original soundtrack of this game is composed by the birthday"kid" himself and then converted into 8-bit music.

If you think the game is nice and want me to flesh it out into something more of a full game please let me know in the comment and encourage me to continue development.

Game developer: Axbakk Games

Original music: Rasmus Jansson

Music 8-bit conversion: Oscar Pettersson

SFX: Takuikaninja

Labelart: GoogieToons
